long_description: This top-grade Merino wool/nylon blend sock stays soft; maintains its stretch and fit even after seasons of use. Made with 70% Merino wool/29% nylon/1% elastic to absorb and wick moisture away from your feet, keeping them dry and cool in summer--warm in winter. Lycra(R) spandex ribbing in upper keeps sock in place; arch brace is knit with Lycra(R) spandex for added support and comfort. Light-density terry-loop padding provides a soft, cushioned fit for comfort on the trail. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This top-grade Merino wool/nylon blend sock stays soft; maintains its stretch and fit even after seasons of use.
